entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
